job_details.Vacaturetitel:
Software Development Engineer, AWS Telecoms Prototyping
Software Development Engineer, AWS Telecoms Prototyping
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As a Telecommunications Software Development Engineer, you will:
   * Design, develop, test and deploy well-architected software
   * Feel a real sense of achievement from completing and delivering projects in less time than you thought possible.
   * Get hands-on with a range of technologies and practice a range of disciplines: back-end, front-end, networking, DevOps, machine learning, data science, data architecture. We are curious generalists who don't pigeon-hole ourselves as particular "flavors" of engineer and never say "that's not my job".
   * Collaborate with customers through full engagements; you'll learn about their business challenges, rapidly design and develop prototypes to solve them, showcase the functionality you've written in demos and finally see the difference you've made when customers deploy solutions into their production environments.
   * Work with the latest AWS services and open-source technologies to build your prototypes. You'll always be encouraged to pick the right tools for the job.

   About the team
   We are a team of problem-solvers and builders who work on our customer's challenges that don't have cookie-cutter solutions. We work with the latest 5G and GenAI technologies and partner with leaders in these spaces. We often don't have the answers right away, and are expected to Dive Deep to figure out the best approach. The code we write provides immediate value for customers by showing how technology can solve their problems. #BDSI_AIP
job_details.full_text:
Software Development Engineer, AWS Telecoms Prototyping
Software Development Engineer, AWS Telecoms Prototyping

As a Telecommunications Software Development Engineer, you will:
   * Design, develop, test and deploy well-architected software
   * Feel a real sense of achievement from completing and delivering projects in less time than you thought possible.
   * Get hands-on with a range of technologies and practice a range of disciplines: back-end, front-end, networking, DevOps, machine learning, data science, data architecture. We are curious generalists who don't pigeon-hole ourselves as particular "flavors" of engineer and never say "that's not my job".
   * Collaborate with customers through full engagements; you'll learn about their business challenges, rapidly design and develop prototypes to solve them, showcase the functionality you've written in demos and finally see the difference you've made when customers deploy solutions into their production environments.
   * Work with the latest AWS services and open-source technologies to build your prototypes. You'll always be encouraged to pick the right tools for the job.

   About the team
   We are a team of problem-solvers and builders who work on our customer's challenges that don't have cookie-cutter solutions. We work with the latest 5G and GenAI technologies and partner with leaders in these spaces. We often don't have the answers right away, and are expected to Dive Deep to figure out the best approach. The code we write provides immediate value for customers by showing how technology can solve their problems. #BDSI_AIP

profile_classification.rationale: The job description mentions "machine learning" and "GenAI technologies" but focuses heavily on general software development, prototyping, and customer collaboration within the AWS ecosystem. It lacks specific details on core ML/GenAI tasks like model training, fine-tuning, or advanced generative model development, making it lean towards a general software engineering role.

phrases: Design, develop, test and deploy well-architected software
back-end, front-end, networking, DevOps
build your prototypes
The code we write provides immediate value for customers
job_tasks.justification: These phrases directly relate to the creation, testing, and deployment of software, encompassing various engineering disciplines and the development of functional code.

phrases: learn about their business challenges
rapidly design and develop prototypes to solve them
showcase the functionality you've written in demos
customers deploy solutions into their production environments
work on our customer's challenges that don't have cookie-cutter solutions
figure out the best approach
showing how technology can solve their problems
job_tasks.justification: These phrases highlight the need to understand customer needs, translate them into technical solutions, demonstrate the value of those solutions, and ensure they are deployed to address business problems.

phrases: DevOps
customers deploy solutions into their production environments
job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'DevOps' directly points to operational aspects, and deploying solutions into production environments implies managing and maintaining them.

phrases: machine learning
data science
GenAI technologies
job_tasks.justification: These terms indicate exposure to or work with ML and GenAI concepts, though the depth and specific tasks are not detailed.

phrases: data architecture
job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'data architecture' suggests involvement in the design and structure of data systems.
